Malice:
 
he male smiled, she was too good to him.  
"I'll walk you to your room, okay?" Malice said, offering his arm.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNightmare:

The femme smiled and she stood up, she gave a sweet quick kiss in 
Malice's cheek.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Hellplague/ Malice:
>  
> "No, he can't.  He is going to be offline for a long time, Malice 
nearly took his face off.  I suspect a full day to repair his face," 
the Sweep commander said.
>  
> "Let's get you to bed," Malice said to Blacknightmare, "We're all 
tired.  C'mon, I'll tuck you in," the male jested.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare:
> 
> "Yes..."said the feme"We have a dificult while.... Sis, are you 
sure 
> that he couldn't free himself?"
> 
> 
>

> wrote:
> > Malice:
> >  
> > The male put his sword away, and held Blacknightmare close.
> > "It's alright, I'm alright, you're alright, eveyone is alright.  
> Let's get some sleep." 
> > 
> > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Blacknightmare:
> >

emotions.
> >

<bustercross365@y...>

> > > "I locked him in the chamber, he won't come out until I say 
so,"

> one

closely.

> for

> to

> > knocking 
> > > > him off balance for a moment.  He was dazed a moment, then 
> > looked 
> > > > around, to his clone, to Hellplague, then to Blacknightmare.
> > > > > "Yeah... I'm fine.... I think," he said in a far off voice.

> but

got

> > > > Malice 
> > > > > up.  The sleeping, prone form of Malice jumped off the bed

> > > > > cleared the distance between him and Injustice in less 
than

> > > > > second, a clawed arm raised.  Malice slashed the clone

> > > the 
> > > > > face, cutting deep.  he clone staggered back, hands 
covering
